title: RADS error help
body: So here i was playing lol as usual, when my system crashed, ok i had bad sectors so i repaired my computer, and everything was gone. I downloaded lol, and it gave me RADS error. I thought it was about my firewall, but no, i had a danger of getting a virus by disabeling firewall, and it didnt work. I tried the thing with setting something to 8888, 8844, and then going to cmd and typing ipconfig /flushdns, or whatever (copypasted from youtube XD) and it still didnt work. I went to my rads folder, and seeing what was in system, and it had everything, but it doesent work. Riot please fix this and if anybody can help me with this just please do!

replies.body: Most of the time you should be able to clear up those RADS errors by making sure that your OS isn't blocking the client from using its own game files. Update your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure that you've got the right settings in place.
So wtf do i do XDXDXD
Run through the steps in this-> [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)!
